projects.title: Chat Wave
projects.description: Used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the creation of a user-friendly chat interface. Acquired hands-on experience in Node.js and Socket.io, implementing custom commands and emoji replacements to enhance user satisfaction.

projects.title: Mern-App
projects.description: Build dynamic web applications with the MERN stack, combining MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js for efficient and scalable full-stack development. Create responsive websites with a powerful back-end and interactive front-end, offering speed, security, and ease of maintenance.
